revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=BEFSR41W |revision=-RN |upc=745883554713 |asin= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Brecis |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols= |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols= |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.101.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Linksys Ricochet Router}} :[http://web.archive.org/web/20060610072555/http://ricochet.com/LinksysRicochetRouter.aspx Product page] (via archive.org)] :[http://web.archive.org/web/20030713163936/http://ricochet.com/docs/lrr_qsg.pdf Manual] (via archive.org) :Per the manual, the WAN port is disabled. *[http://ricochet.wikispaces.com/Linksys+Ricochet+Router More information and a terrible quality internal shot] :This device uses a Merlin for ''Ricochet PC Card modem'' :(which is inserted into the PC Card slot in the back of the device). ===See also=== *[[Linksys BEFSR11]] • [[Kendin]] KS8695 (ARM922T) *[[Linksys BEFSR41]] • [[Kendin]] KS8695 (ARM922T) *[[Linksys BEFSR41 v3.1]] • [[Micrel]] KS8695X (ARM922T) *[[Linksys BEFVP41]] • [[Samsung]] S3C1510B (ARM7) *[[Linksys BEFSR81]] • [[Kendin]] KS8695 (ARM922T) *[[Linksys WFR11B-JP]] • [[Kendin]] KS8695 @166MHz __NOTOC__
